name: I Want Nuts
description:
A tiny squirrel is trying to remember where he put his nuts, but gets distracted by his own peculiar thoughts. While he makes his way through increasingly dystopian surroundings, he has to mind poisonous mushrooms and evil road rollers. Will he finally find his nut?

Features: Procedurally generated levels, a story about a forgetful squirrel and a desirable future told in 4 parts, sometimes working skill-adaptive systems, not quite great balancing, and maybe nuts
